contents:
我看用处不大，特别是兔杂把这个和纳粹捆绑，顺理成章，西方人反而会觉得坦克人是胡搅蛮缠吧对兔杂，只能用...


已经有欧美人对粉蛆心生厌烦了：
https://twitter.com/awesome_13358/status/1224870437374398464

When does China apologize to the world? Coronavirus ,SARS and bird flus originated in China. Always China.
Chinese eat live rats and bats etc. Is this the cause of the coronavirus? Or Did Wuhan coronavirus escape from a secret lab? real 731?? Coronavirus is reality, not manga
